task.title: How do I display contacts with their full names or short names?
task.shortdesc: On your contact list, you can display contactsâ€™ full names (names with their server addresses) or short names (names without their server addresses). By default, full names are displayed.

step.cmd: Select how to display contacts' names.

entry.p:
Click Contacts icon to open the Contacts panel. Then, click Contacts drop-down arrow icon
and select Short Names to display contact names without their server addresses. Clear this setting to display full names.

Click Sametime Contacts icon Sametime Contacts to open the Contacts panel in the Notes sidebar. Then, click
Actions and preferences
View and select Short Names to display contact names without their server addresses. Clear this setting to display full names.

postreq.note: If two people on your contact list have the same first and last names, they might have identical short names. If the contacts display in a private group, you can easily identify each person by creating unique nicknames. Nicknames display on your contact list only. Complete the following action to rename your contact with a nickname.

ul.li: Right-click (Ctrl + click for Macintosh) the contact's name and click Edit Nickname.
